name: Hydroneer
description:
Hydroneer is a mining simulation game set in a low-fantasy world. Dig for gold and other resources to turn a profit and build massive mining machines.

Dig
Use the state-of-the-art voxel based terrain system, you can create cave networks, quarry pits, or even mud mountains.

Rigs
Rigs are large modular player built machines used for a variety of uses - create a refuelling machines, transport pay dirt, and build massive digging machines.

Create
Hydroneer features a dynamic modular system for both rigs and structures. Create the base of operations from your own design to optimise your work. Turn gold nuggets into gold bars, and turn iron into weapons!

Fish
Want to take a break from mining? Or maybe seek the wealth of the sea? Spend your cash on a fishing rod and head to a nearby lake, river, or sea!
